value:
This "kimono" isn't bad. A shame it is
only worn for the new year. Perhaps I
will bring several back to Niðavellir.

Niðavellir also has its New Year's
traditions. They are quite extravagant.

So the cogs have turned, bringing
us into a new year...

You think you can be lazy just
because it's the New Year, do you?
What a childlike notion.

Hmph, that Reginn. She wants a New
Year's gift, though I don't know what
she expects. Her pestering is endless.

I, Fáfnir, Niðavellir's king, have come
to deliver a New Year's greeting in
place of $Nf.

New Year's Day determines one's
fate in the coming year. My
victories are clearly secured.

Did you think that I would let my
guard down just because of the
New Year?

Pathetic... Have even I been
distracted by this festive spirit?

Yes...this is good. You would do well
to continue admiring my prowess.

I am Fáfnir, king of Niðavellir. I'll
show you lazy fools how to truly
celebrate the New Year.

Even as the calendar changes to a
new year, my goals remain the same,
as will my actions to achieve them.$k$pI will make Niðavellir a force to be
feared, richer and stronger than all
who oppose us. That is my duty.$k$pSummoner, our contract demands
that I lend my strength to your cause
for the sake of Askr.$k$pHowever, when peace returns, I will
resume my own ambitions. My plans
are already being laid.$k$pI have no need to pray to vague
god-like idols at the new year; I will
succeed by my strength alone.$k$pAlthough, I understand you weaklings
may need to rely on gods. Now, let's
go. I'll be at your side...watching.
はっ
邪魔だ
ぐうっ
Impudent...!
Let's celebrate...
As the years turn...
Only the beginning!
Eternal night!
I've been made a fool...
Sigh
You are in the presence of Fáfnir, Niðavellir's king. Greetings in this...new year.
...You have some spine, approaching me like that.
Starting the year by visiting a shrine for good luck? Hah! As if the gods will favor you any more in the new year...
In Niðavellir, the New Year pyrotechnics are something to behold...
This kimono...is acceptable, I've decided.
Reginn continues to trail behind me... What is she expecting from me?
At New Year, it's customary to give gifts to those beneath you... Here—this is for you.
Now.
Take your time...
Ring them in...
